spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is maintained, but door swings are inconsistently rendered or missing. Window placements in Bedroom 2 and Bedroom 4 deviate from the plan's exact proportions.

structural_fidelity.notes: Most rooms are present, but the foyer entrance sequence is oversimplified. The wall separating the utility and kitchen lacks the specific structural indentations seen in the 2D plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture mapping is highly accurate to the plan, including the dining table, living room arrangement, and bed placements. Scale is consistent.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent orthographic projection and clean geometry. Lighting is soft and professional. Some minor clipping on internal wall joins.

detected_errors.description: Missing internal door leaves and specific entry vestibule details.
The red entry indicator is misplaced on the right side of the 3D render, whereas the plan shows entry from the bottom.
Proportion of the deck area near the guitar/piano is slightly compressed compared to the 2D dimensions.
